transcript:
Hello?
Hello?
Hello. Haan ji.
Hello, Namaskar sir, Gupta ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Han ji.
Sir India Mart se baat kar raha hu aapke account manager se. Maine kuch lead aapko sir suggest ki thi sir please consume kijiye sir lead. Aap use hi nahi kar rahe sir India Mart.
Well dekh lenge.
Aap sab dekhega sir dekho aapko main bhi bata raha hu ek aapne us din mere se bola tha ki sir 25 ton aur 20 ton ki jo leads hai ye sab fake hoti hai. Fir maine aapko ek do leads jaise ek ton, do ton us tarah ki bhi leads thi. Thik hai? To us tarah ki leads to sir aapki better hoti hogi jaise 70 kg ki lead hai sir aapki.
Main actually dekhi nahi main actually bahar ke yaha aaya hua hu na. Main abhi check karta hu.
Achcha.
Thik hai. Sir main aapko further tab connect kar lunga.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not using the suggested buyleads.

- Customer stated 25 and 20 ton leads are fake.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested using smaller quantity leads.

- Executive will connect later with the customer.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect with customer later.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, follow up
